text: mi’imenaninina mi’iminatini besitefītochachewi፣ bek’enyochachewimi birihanachewi yemīrot’i sīẖoni bemitayachewi k’eni (minida ālilachewi)፡፡ zarē bisiratachihu bewisit’ochachewi zewitarīwochi sitiẖonu keširochachewi wenizochi yemīfesisubachewi genetochi nachewi (yibalalu)፡፡ yihi irisu talak’u ‘idili newi፡፡
